attributes.action: Readjust laws on temporary agency staff
attributes.additional_details: Please help agency workers have better rights in securing permanent work as many of them can't get on the property ladder because it's not secure work I am in this sutuatation and it's frustrating as I am currently looking for my first home with my fiancé and keep finding myself out of work every 3 months or so it should be law that if an agency worker is working they should be offered permanent employment and not just let go then taken back on again to get around this
